thread.section_title: Namecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Namecheap | www.namecheap.com
thread.title: Trent

author: Trent
title: Trent
text:
Great company, clean interface, I moved all my domains after GoDaddy CEO shot that elephant. They however are impossible to get ahold of anyone in senior management, but the support department is good enough. Much better than GoDaddy or the others.
Held over 500+ domains with them no problems at all. Be sure to check their coupon page before you checkout as you can always save a little bit.
